name: Minimus
description:
Gain as many points as you can in a relaxing 5 minutes – in this minimalistic puzzle block matching game.

Tap to rotate and match 2 or more identical blocks, gaining combos and points.

Minimalistic abstract style to help you relax and focused.

Compete with the best in the world via Game Centre Leaderboards.

Good luck and enjoy the relaxing Minimus!
